title: Just lost -3 LP because i lost connection when i have internet?
body:
http://imgur.com/a/9aN6W

I ran a cable test and was flicking through websites. I never lost internet connection once. Never had this issue with any other game.

replies.body: There could have been a hiccup with something on your settings, hardware, or ISP.  These hiccups are especially possible if on wi-fi.  It's hard to say for sure; though, and all I could recommend is using our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure that your network is as strong as it can be.  I hope that helps!
